sub_topic: Probability of drawing a certain card from a deck of cards
message_1: What is the probability of drawing an Ace of Spades from a standard deck of 52 cards?
message_2:
There is only 1 Ace of Spades in a standard deck of 52 cards. Therefore, the probability of drawing the Ace of Spades is 1 out of 52, which can be represented as a fraction:

1/52

As a decimal, this is approximately:

0.0192

And as a percentage, this is:

1.92%

So, the probability of drawing an Ace of Spades from a standard deck of 52 cards is 1.92%.
